author: Brian Blackstone
title: Nestlé Sales Growth Weakens to Slowest in Decades
text:
VEVEY, Switzerland—Sluggish U.S. demand limited Nestlé SA’s sales growth to its slowest pace in decades last year, underscoring the challenge facing the Swiss company as it tries to reposition itself as a nimble provider of healthy food and drinks.

The full-year results, which missed analyst estimates despite a raft of measures to jump-start growth, marked the first big test for Chief Executive Mark Schneider. The former health-care executive has faced pressure to raise shareholder returns from activist investor Daniel Loeb...
